result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan R. Krok

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Roger K.

2:12 PM
Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State. Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Kristyne Watson. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: Final pre-trial scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 08:30 am. $1000 Cash Bond Set w/ continued conditions (see bond entry). ec
DE in custody and appearing today at 1pm Intake.

11:10 PM   State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman.  No appearance by the Defendant. Attorney Xavier Solis appears on behalf of the defendant on cases 21CF824/22CF500/21CF965.  Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 21CF824/22CF500/21CF896/21CF965. Attorney Solis does not have an explanation for why the DE is not present and he also checked if the DE went to Branch 3. Attorney Solis requests the bench warrant be stayed so he may attempt to contact the DE. 

21CF824: Based on the DE's non-appearance the Court forfeits bond and issues a bench warrant with $5,000.00 cash bond.

22CF500: Based on the DE's non-appearance the Court forfeits bond and issues a bench warrant with $1,000.00 cash bond.

21CF896: Based on the DE's non-appearance the Court forfeits bond and issues a bench warrant with $3,000.00 cash bond.

21CF965: Based on the DE's non-appearance the Court forfeits bond and issues a bench warrant with $3,000.00 cash bond.

Minutes:  21CF824/22CF500.  Judge Dreyfus acting for Branch 3.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Drew Lehman appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person along w/Atty Solis.  Defense counsel requests another hrg date; Atty Solis reports the deft wishes to w/draw his plea in 21CF824.  In addition, deft has new charges pending (22CF500).  Atty Solis would like add'l time to speak w/his client.  No objection by the State.  Sentencing/motion hrg/FPT set over to 8/17/22 @ 11am.

09:51 AM Defendant, Ryan R. Krok, appeared with Attorney Xavier Solis.  Attorney Daniel Joseph Tombasco appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Roger K.

03:22 PM   Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Toni Young.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on May 3, 2022 at 09:15 am. $500  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  sg
and witness list filed by the State
